channel.title: Pk equipment crashes client

item.title: Pk equipment crashes client
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

when i try to spawn vesta spear it gives me an error on client (something with a model id of above 60k)
heres the code for it on client

if(i == 19971){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.aString170 = "Vesta longsword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "The best longsword.".getBytes(); class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 14399;//Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 700; class8.anInt190 = 372; class8.anInt198 = 468; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 6; class8.anInt194 = 0; class8.anInt165 = 14399;//Male Wield View class8.anInt200 = 14399;//Female Wield View class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; }
can anyone help me?
